test.name: Verify basic search functionality for eBay

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (134.0.6998.88) detected in PATH at /usr/local/bin/chromedriver might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (135.0.7049.115); currently, chromedriver 135.0.7049.114 is recommended for chrome 135.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry

kw.name: Input Text

test.doc: This test case verifies the basic search
